abstract_ssm: This collection contains the editorial and research files of Bernice Diskin who was the editor of the communist bulletin, "Cultural Reporter". Originally titled "Cultural Notes", Diskin created the newsletter in conjunction with the National Cultural Conference of the Communist Party in 1973. Materials in this collection consist primarily of subject files compiled by Diskin for her research. The collection also contains a number of materials from the Cultural Conference including correspondence with Communist Party leaders, transcripts, and audio recordings. It also contains "Cultural Reporter" drafts and original issues.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
